text: Ivan Yordanov Kostov () (born 23 December 1949) is a Bulgarian politician. He was the 47th Prime Minister of Bulgaria in office from May 1997 to July 2001. He was leader of the Union of Democratic Forces (UDF) between December 1994 and July 2001. ==Other websites== * Speeches, Interviews and Photos * Otgovori.eu: Ivan Kostov's answers to a large variety of questions Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Sofia Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Ivan Kostov
